headline: Evercore ISI Remains Bullish on Air Products and Chemicals (APD) Following Q4 2025 Results
summary: Air Products and Chemicals, Inc. (NYSE:APD) is one of the 12 best commodity stocks to buy right now. On November 11, 2025, The Fly reported that Air Products and Chemicals, Inc. (NYSE:APD) saw its price target reduced from $375 to $325 by Evercore ISI, while maintaining its “Outperform” rating. With the firm noting a shift away from […]
